projects.instructions:
To add a Prezi presentation:
1. Create a new folder in prezi/ with a descriptive name
2. Add prezi-url.txt with the Prezi share URL
3. Add metadata.txt with presentation details
4. Optionally add preview.jpg (1200x675px recommended)
5. Update this metadata.json file with the new presentation
